mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID AS userId, USER_NAME AS userName, ROLE AS role, LAWYER_STATUS AS status FROM USERS WHERE LAWYER_STATUS = 'PENDING' ORDER BY USER_ID DESC
SELECT USER_ID AS userId, USER_NAME AS userName, ROLE AS role, LAWYER_STATUS AS status FROM USERS WHERE ROLE = 'ROLE_LAWYER' OR LAWYER_STATUS = 'PENDING' ORDER BY USER_ID DESC
SELECT USER_ID AS userId, USER_NAME AS userName, LAWYER_STATUS AS status, REJECT_REASON AS rejectReason FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{lawyerId}
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET LAWYER_STATUS = 'APPROVED', ROLE = 'ROLE_LAWYER' WHERE USER_ID = #{lawyerId}
